data.title: Literature & Fiction Children's Audiobooks Audiobooks - New Releases
data.meta_description: Our unmatched selection of Literature & Fiction Children's Audiobooks books offer the highest quality audio and narration. Your first book is Free with trial!
data.text:
The Starship Safari

Kids Stories Book

By: Ayokunle Mathew Akinbi

Narrated by: Derek Hall

Length: 38 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Embark on an extraordinary journey across the cosmos with Captain Zara and her intrepid crew aboard the Starship Safari! In this captivating collection of adventures, young listeners will explore distant planets, encounter exotic creatures, and uncover mysteries that defy imagination. From the shimmering savannas of Galactica-6, where towering Galactic Giraffes roam gracefully, to the Enchanted Oasis nestled deep within a jungle teeming with life, each chapter of The Starship Safari invites listeners on a sensory-rich exploration.

The Magic Mirror

Kids Stories Book

By: Ayokunle Mathew Akinbi

Narrated by: Richard Newberg

Length: 16 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Dive into a world of wonder and adventure with "The Magic Mirror Kids Stories Book." Follow the enchanting journey of Mia and Max, two curious siblings who discover an ancient mirror in their grandparents' attic. This isn't just any mirror—it's a portal to the past, the future, and fantastical realms beyond their wildest dreams. Through fifteen captivating chapters, Mia and Max unravel family secrets, explore magical kingdoms, and embark on quests that test their courage and wits.

The Wise Old Turtle

Kids Stories Book

By: Ayokunle Mathew Akinbi

Narrated by: Andie Ferman

Length: 22 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Embark on an enchanting journey with Jack and the Wise Old Turtle in "The Wise Old Turtle Kids Stories Book," a captivating collection of bedtime stories that blend magic, wisdom, and adventure. In the heart of a mysterious forest, a young boy named Jack discovers a hidden pond and meets the Wise Old Turtle, a gentle and ancient guardian of the woods. Through fifteen beautifully crafted chapters, Jack and the turtle embark on a series of adventures that teach valuable life lessons and celebrate the beauty of nature.

Why the Fisherman Fished

By: D.T. Rossi

Narrated by: Kendra Woods

Length: 5 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Dive into D.T. Rossi’s enchanting tale, “Why The Fisherman Fished,” where a little boy’s big discovery unfolds with heartwarming charm. Each day, the boy eagerly awaits The Fisherman’s return, hoping to marvel at his fascinating catches. Instead, the boy is captivated by wild and enchanting tales of the sea. One magical day, after witnessing a spectacular catch! The boy realizes that true joy lies in the journey and experiences along the way.

Much Ado About Nothing: Shakespeare for Kids

Shakespeare in a Language Children Will Understand and Love

By: Jeanette Vigon

Narrated by: Tiana Ferrante

Length: 3 hrs and 15 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Welcome to a vibrant and engaging edition of William Shakespeare's "Much Ado About Nothing," a timeless comedy that continues to delight and provoke thought among audiences worldwide. This edition invites you into the bustling world of Messina, where wit battles wit, and love intertwines with deception, offering a rich exploration of romance and misunderstanding. Experience the sparkling duel of words between Beatrice and Benedick, and the tumultuous path of Claudio and Hero's love, as they navigate the trials of miscommunication, pride, and societal pressures.

The Adventure of Pico the Rabbit

By: Jean Tazo

Narrated by: Erica Halverson

Length: 1 hr and 5 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Jean Tazo is a passionate storyteller with a love for weaving tales that inspire, entertain, and ignite the imagination. He particularly enjoys telling stories that inspires young mind and teach them important good life values. Moreover, he enjoys sharing his stories with the world. His experiences as a parent have fueled his passion for children's literature, driving him to create engaging and meaningful stories that resonate with young listeners.

What Is Money?

Little Book, Big Idea 2

By: Noodle Juice

Narrated by: Joseph Edward Degnan

Length: 21 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

What is money? Well, money makes the world go around...But who looks after our money? Is money good? What are taxes? What is the future of money? These are very BIG questions that need exploring, and understanding the answers will help everyone.

Quest for the Enchanted Stone

Tales Of Vanderstone: The Rock Kingdom, Book 1

By: Kyle Bumbalough

Narrated by: Jama Smith

Length: 51 mins

Unabridged

Overall

5 out of 5 stars 8

Performance

5 out of 5 stars 8

Story

5 out of 5 stars 8

Sometime ago cavemen walked the earth and we learned that they were not the brightest of species. Yet in the ancient kingdom of Vanderstone were cavemen thrived, a head injury has left Queen Kayla mumbling and the kingdom in turmoil. Her courageous children—Bryce, Myleena, Alan, and young Elliot—set out on an epic quest to find a magical stone that will heal their mother and restore peace to their realm.

5 out of 5 stars

Beautiful

By Maceffp on 08-11-24

Gracie's Big Kindergarten Day

By: Marie Andrea

Narrated by: Virtual Voice

Length: 31 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Gracie’s Big Kindergarten Day Gracie Lee Johnson is ready for her first day of kindergarten—or is she? With a favorite dress full of bright sunflowers, a carefully practiced smile, and a big plan in her heart, Gracie embarks on a day filled with new friends, fun learning, and exciting adventures. Join Gracie as she discovers the joy of being kind, the thrill of learning new things, and the magic of a great day at school. Perfect for young readers, this sweet and simple story is a celebration of the courage, curiosity, and kindness that make every day in kindergarten a new adventure!

The Princess’s Rescue

Kids Stories Book

By: Ayokunle Mathew Akinbi

Narrated by: Samantha Leal

Length: 19 mins

Unabridged

Overall

5 out of 5 stars 1

Performance

5 out of 5 stars 1

Story

5 out of 5 stars 1

In the enchanting kingdom of Eldoria, where magic and adventure intertwine, Princess Isabella vanishes without a trace, casting a shadow of worry over the entire realm. In "The Princess’s Rescue," join Princess Isabella’s closest friends—Lucas, Mia, and Oliver—as they embark on a daring quest to bring her back.

The Sawtooth Secret

The Sawtooth Legacy, Book Three

By: R.B. Moller

Narrated by: Josh Heathcock

Length: 6 hrs and 38 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Step into a whirlwind of fast-paced, action-packed, country style fun with the Sawtooth Secret. This inspirational tale full of twists and turns, mystery and suspense, will transport you on a wholesome outdoor adventure like the classics of old. Danger lurks around every corner and battles for freedom and survival are commonplace, as three teens rise up to become heroes.

The Prince of Yorsha Doon

The Wingfeather Saga

By: Andrew Peterson

Narrated by: Andrew Peterson

Length: 9 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

The Prince of Yorsha Doon tells the story of Safiki—already beloved by thousands of Wingfeather fans—as he emerges from his life of solitary freedom and becomes an accidental hero. Life on the streets of the bustling and mysterious city of Yorsha Doon can be hard, but Safiki loves being independent, free from the complications of personal relationships. But when he bumps into a very strange stranger who's being far too conspicuous with the valuable book he's carrying, Safiki finds himself at the center of a noble but foolhardy rescue.

EcoQueen

The Superhero with the Power to Reverse Climate Change

By: Joanna Measer Kanow

Narrated by: Shaelee Rooke

Length: 7 hrs and 35 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Following the death of her mother in a horrifying wildfire, seventeen-year-old Kora wants to ensure that not one more child loses a parent to a traumatic climate event. As the most severe possible projected climate change outcomes actually happen in real-time, rapid action is needed. But is it too late? What can a female, bi-racial, teenager with untapped superpowers do? How about saving the planet? Empowered by her supernatural abilities, Kora embraces her destiny as EcoQueen, the superhero of a new generation, whom the world so desperately needs.

Score Out

Perfect Balance Gymnastics , Book 6

By: Melisa Torres

Narrated by: Rachel F. Hirsch

Length: 4 hrs and 55 mins

Unabridged

Overall

5 out of 5 stars 2

Performance

5 out of 5 stars 2

Story

5 out of 5 stars 2

Carmen Alvarez is new to competitive gymnastics, and it isn't quite what she expected. Her Level Four season is having a rough start with silly mistakes and several falls. Carmen continues to work hard. But just when she has competition figured out, she learns she must score a 34.00 All-Around to be eligible for Level Five. What will Carmen do if her season ends without getting the coveted 34.00 All-Around? Can she talk her family and coaches into letting her attend one more meet to try to get the score? And if she can get to another meet, will she be able to score out?

The Mystery of the Moonstone

Kids Stories Book

By: Ayokunle Mathew Akinbi

Narrated by: Eric Brown

Length: 26 mins

Unabridged

Overall

0 out of 5 stars 0

Performance

0 out of 5 stars 0

Story

0 out of 5 stars 0

Join Emily and her friends on an enchanting journey through the heart of the forest in "The Mystery of the Moonstone." As they uncover the secrets of a powerful relic known as the moonstone, they must navigate ancient legends, face daring challenges, and confront a dark force that threatens the harmony of their magical world. In this captivating collection of fifteen tales, each chapter unfolds with rich sensory details and vivid imagery, immersing young listeners in a world filled with lush forests, mystical creatures, and thrilling adventures.
